mapper.update: update tb_idea set use_count = use_count + #{p} where id = #{id}
update tb_idea set use_count = use_count + 1, first_uid = #{uid} where id = #{id} and use_count = 0
mapper.select: select t.i ideaId, t.c cnt from (select ti.id i,ti.create_time ct, count(*) c from tb_post tp inner join tb_idea ti on tp.idea_id = ti.id where ti.defunct = 0 and ti.category_id = #{categoryId} and tp.defunct = 0 and tp.verify_type = 1 and tp.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by tp.idea_id) t order by t.c desc, t.ct desc limit 1
